author: Diego Pereira
comment: It is a decent watchface, nothing exceptional. But it does not update temperature info correctly, what's unacceptable for a paid watchface (always shows 19 degrees). Either fix the bug or remove the misleading/broken functionality.
title: Functional, but that's it

author: Guy
comment: Nice watch face. Interactive features don't work well. Would like to be able to turn them off or replace them with second time zone. Wish you could select only the accent colors you want for automatic change.
title: Nice

author: Thomas Viñas
comment: It's a very nice looking watch. Lots of color options and rather functional with a very responsive team (great job guys!). I know phone battery is coming which is will probably make it my daily watch face. The only thing that could be improved is adding more options for the user such as deciding what icons(I.e. battery or weather) are displayed and choosing when the colors change or which colors are on the automatic cycle.

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi Thomas,
we appreciate your feedback,

Phone battery status, will be added in some of upcoming releases.
The automatic color change, can be added in next release.
Thanks for idea

EDIT: Release 1.04 will be available in a few hours
- application intro
- four new accent colors
- option to automatic change of accent color after some period of time

title: Pretty and functional

author: Jed Dye
comment: Once again face is nice but ambient is crap and can't be customized. I want to be able to change that ugly font, size and location on screen and an option to add date

author: Michael Carolin
comment: I really like it, but for the price, I would enjoy a few more features, ESPECIALLY other color options for the clock outer trim than just black. If that happens I'll bump it up to 5 stars.
title: One of the best!

author: Michelle Cooper
comment: I like the watch face alot but it only gives me one color. I cant get other colors to sync. Very frustrating especially for a paid app.

author: Keith Holmes
comment: Automatic accent change does not work, yet! G Watch
title: Works fine but....

author: Philip Rowe
comment: My current favorite, simple and clean
title: Nice watch face

author: Tim Moretti
comment: Very nice and smooth watch face!

author: Matt Smith
comment: Beautiful app. But ambient mode is very very ugly.
title: Ambient ugly

author: Mark Ingram
comment: Really nice, but a couple of suggestions.. Ambient mode ~ little bit more info ie date.  Main screen ~ add interactivity to the date to show agenda, when tapping on battery for more info show phone battery status as well
title: Really nice and clean

author: dmar droimar
comment: Nice options, looks good on moto
title: Elegant and practical

author: Isreal Mathew
comment: Needs a lot more options in ambient for me to use on a daily basis - show weather, battery, some limited colour maybe... Let alone I don't like font or size of time in ambient either. Cant see phone battery anywhere. On the plus side, the interactive weather button and detail screen are great.

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi Israel, we could add this improvements in next release. The problem is, the Ambient mode is limited by system. We could add for example weather and battery icon, but its not be clickable in Ambient mode (take a look http://justpaste.it/AmbientModeDescription). 

Same problem is with color, the Ambient  mode can use only black, white, and grays.

title: I like the active screen, ambient not so much.

author: jovanni carlos
comment: This just makes my watch look simple yet very beautiful!
title: Visualisation

author: Eric Bird
comment: No matter how many times I tell it to refresh, it doesn't switch to Fahrenheit.

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi Eric, it's strange. I check this right now. I switched temperature unit to Fahrenheit and it works great.

Try change your accent color, if not change, it will be the sync problem. Then try this.

- uninstall the face application from phone
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Watch Face again

title: Nice interface, but...

author: Mike Hardesty
comment: I have bought the watch face and like the concept, but have some suggestions for options; make the coloured circle go right up to the side of the watch face instead of within a black circle, have an option to have a full color ambient watch face without animation (the current ambient mode is horrible), and have an option to hide the digital seconds﻿
